participant_1.background:
I'm interested in learning more about how to cope with my wife's terminal cancer.
I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
I love spending time with my dog on Christmas.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
i vacation in florida every winter.

participant_2.background:
I like to wear the same pants every day so I don't have to think about what to wear.
I enjoy helping my community by serving on the city council.
i love the rain.
I like mangoes because they are sweet and juicy.
my favorite basketball team is the vancouver grizzlies.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well too, thanks! What are you up to today?
I'm just getting ready to head to work. I'm on the city council, so I have a meeting this afternoon.
Oh, that sounds interesting! What kind of things do you do on the city council?
We work on a variety of issues, including planning, zoning, and development. We also work with the mayor and other city departments to make sure that our city is running smoothly.
That sounds like a lot of work, but also very rewarding!
It is! I love being able to make a difference in my community.
That's great! I'm sure your community is lucky to have you.
I like to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family.
Those sound like great hobbies! I love to read too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like historical fiction and mysteries.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too! I think it's a great way to escape from the stresses of everyday life.
Definitely! I'm glad we have something in common.
